svg.text:
Problem: Previous experiment exposure affects current behavior
Timeline: ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Week 1-2: User in Experiment A (Treatment) Week 3-4: User in Experiment B (Control) └─▶ But user behavior still affected by Exp A! ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Solutions: 1. Washout period between experiments 2. Ensure experiments don't share users 3. Control for previous experiment exposure in analysis
